ygData.subject: Re: test
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey guys, Another master potter here. I must admit, I got into pottery for the money. As such I m level 114 and pumping out pie tins. Problem is they are
ygData.messageBody:
Hey guys,

Another master potter here.

I must admit, I got into pottery for the money. As such I'm level 114 and
pumping out pie tins. Problem is they are trivial and I want to advance
further.

Can anyone tell me what the next item is to make that I can learn from?

Also, can anyone post a list of the prices items sell for? Currently I am
far from my potting spot, otherwise I'd do it myself, but if anyone already
has the info, please share.

Graedon
Ranger of Surefall Glade
Britlebane

-----Original Message-----
From: John A. Hoskin [mailto:irex@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 4:28 AM
To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Potters] test


From: "John A. Hoskin" <irex@...>

30pp an hour.. wowsa.

15 is about my limit. I have to run through 4 zones just for material.
I'm an Ogre.

What are you making, if you don't mind telling?

Behemot
Ogre Shaman
Master Potter

At 01:42 AM 7/8/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Nick Emmerich <seorin@...>
>
>I'm out here :) Guess us potters aren't too popular, but we're the ones
that
>get the money =P You should see the EQBrewers list... they're excited about
>new items (understandable) and are hoping to make more than 30 plat an hour
>with it. I can make at least twice that with my lovely potting skill :)
>Gotta love it
>-Rennin of E'Ci
> Trade Council GM
>

>
